SkillScenario: Coach employee to be on time for meetings
TargetStrategies:
Set clear expectations
Describe observed behavior
Explain impact
Ask for perspective
Agree on next steps
Confirm accountability
TargetLanguage:
I want to talk about something I’ve noticed recently.
Here’s a specific example so we’re aligned.
My intention is to help you succeed.
Can you walk me through your perspective?
What’s making this challenging right now?
Here’s why this matters to the team and our goals.
What support would help you improve here?
Let’s agree on a clear next step.
What will you do differently going forward?
I appreciate your openness and effort.
Example Dialogue:
Manager: Thanks for meeting with me.
Employee: Sure.
Manager: I want to talk about a pattern I’ve noticed.
Employee: Okay.
Manager: I’ve seen this behavior happening recently.
Employee: I didn’t realize that.
Manager: It impacts the team in this way.
Employee: I understand.
Manager: What’s your perspective?
Employee: Here’s what’s been going on.
Manager: Let’s agree on a clear next step.
Employee: That sounds fair.

Manager: I’ve seen this behavior happening recently.
Employee: I didn’t realize that.
Manager: It impacts the team in this way.
Employee: I understand.
Manager: What’s your perspective?
Employee: Here’s what’s been going on.
Manager: Let’s agree on a clear next step.
Employee: That sounds fair.

SkillScenario: Coach your employee to multi-task
TargetStrategies:
Set clear expectations
Describe observed behavior
Explain impact
Ask for perspective
Agree on next steps
Confirm accountability
TargetLanguage:
I want to talk about something I’ve noticed recently.
Here’s a specific example so we’re aligned.
My intention is to help you succeed.
Can you walk me through your perspective?
What’s making this challenging right now?
Here’s why this matters to the team and our goals.
What support would help you improve here?
Let’s agree on a clear next step.
What will you do differently going forward?
I appreciate your openness and effort.

Can you walk me through your perspective?
What’s making this challenging right now?
Here’s why this matters to the team and our goals.
What support would help you improve here?
Let’s agree on a clear next step.
What will you do differently going forward?
I appreciate your openness and effort.
Example Dialogue:
Manager: Thanks for meeting with me.
Employee: Sure.
Manager: I want to talk about a pattern I’ve noticed.
Employee: Okay.
Manager: I’ve seen this behavior happening recently.
Employee: I didn’t realize that.
Manager: It impacts the team in this way.
Employee: I understand.
Manager: What’s your perspective?
Employee: Here’s what’s been going on.
Manager: Let’s agree on a clear next step.
Employee: That sounds fair.
